participant_1.background:
I do my laundry on a weekly basis.
I used to wear tight clothes, but now I prefer more comfortable options.
i like to play outside.
My family is not very wealthy, but we do what we can to help those in need.
I'm trying to make up for my past mistakes by using my engineering skills to help make the world a better place.

participant_2.background:
My parents were born in Europe, but I was born in the United States.
I'm looking for a place to move with a climate that's better for my skin.
I am a couponer and I need to be close to the grocery store to maximize my savings.
wedding cakes are my specialty.
i play tabletop games with friends.

content.text: Hello, I am doing well thank you for asking! How are you doing today?
I am doing well too. What are your hobbies?
I like to play tabletop games with friends, bake wedding cakes, and coupon.
I used to play a lot of tabletop games when I was younger. I have not played in a while though.
There are a lot of great games out there right now. You should try to find a group to play with.
I might do that. I just need to find some time in my schedule.
I understand. I know how busy life can get.
What is your favorite tabletop game?
I have a few favorites, but I think my favorite is Gloomhaven.
I have not heard of that one. What is it about?
It is a cooperative dungeon crawler game. It is a lot of fun to play with friends.
It sounds interesting. I will have to check it out.
You should! It is a lot of fun.
